TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RenderOptions extends System.Object
public ref class RenderOptions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于控制对象的呈现行为的选项。

span.span: Provides options for controlling the rendering behavior of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 类的附加属性来指定用于在 WPF 应用程序中呈现文本和视觉对象的选项。You can use the attached properties of the class to specify options for the rendering of text and visual elements in your WPF application. 使用这些选项可以优化速度或质量的呈现。These options enable you to optimize rendering for speed or quality.

span.span: Performance Profiling Tools for WPF

summary.span: 获取或设置给定 的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the for a given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 的 属性或对位图进行动画处理 子代。Use the property on a or descendant that is animating a bitmap. 对任何位图缩放进行动画处理时，默认高质量图像重采样算法有时可能由于消耗过多系统资源导致帧速率下降，从而导致动画明显变慢。When animating the scale of any bitmap, the default high-quality image re-sampling algorithm can sometimes consume sufficient system resources to cause frame rate degradation, effectively causing animations to stutter. 通过将 属性设置为 "，可以在缩放位图时创建更流畅的动画。By setting the property to , you can create a smoother animation when scaling a bitmap. 若要在代码中访问此属性，请使用 和 方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty BitmapScalingModeProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly BitmapScalingModeProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置给定 的缓存失效阈值最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache invalidation threshold maximum value for a given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加属性受 及其派生类型的支持。This attached property is supported by and its derived types. 它旨在用于具有中间图面的画笔，如 和 。It is intended to be used with brushes that have intermediate surfaces, such as and . 仅当 属性设置为 时，它才有效。It only has an effect when the property is set to . 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 不缓存 和 对象的呈现内容。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态方案中，不会更改内容，也不会在场景中使用画笔，而不缓存内容会带来好处，因为它可节省视频内存。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching the content provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当使用静态内容的画笔以非静态方式使用时，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 的默认行为是每隔一帧重新呈现画笔的所有内容，即使内容不变也是如此。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，当静态 或 映射到旋转三维对象的图面时，将发生这种情况。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现静态内容可能会对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过将画笔的 附加属性设置为 "，可以使用平铺画笔对象的缓存版本来提高性能。By setting the attached property on the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. "" 和 "" 属性值是相对大小的值，用于确定由于比例的变化而应重新生成 对象的时间。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，当 属性设置为2.0 时，只有在其大小超过当前缓存大小的两倍时，才需要重新生成 的缓存。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 若要在代码中访问此属性，请使用 和 方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对 使用缓存提示选项。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-xml[RenderOptions#CachingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml#cachingxaml)]

Public Shared ReadOnly CacheInvalidationThresholdMaximumProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置给定 的缓存失效阈值最小值。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache invalidation threshold minimum value for a given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加属性受 及其派生类型的支持。This attached property is supported by and its derived types. 它旨在用于具有中间图面的画笔，如 和 。It is intended to be used with brushes that have intermediate surfaces, such as and . 仅当 属性设置为 时，它才有效。It only has an effect when the property is set to . 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 不缓存 和 对象的呈现内容。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态方案中，不会更改内容，也不会在场景中使用画笔，而不缓存内容会带来好处，因为它可节省视频内存。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching the content provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当使用静态内容的画笔以非静态方式使用时，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 的默认行为是每隔一帧重新呈现画笔的所有内容，即使内容不变，也是如此。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，当静态 或 映射到旋转三维对象的图面时，将发生这种情况。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现静态内容可能会对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过将画笔的 附加属性设置为 "，可以使用平铺画笔对象的缓存版本来提高性能。By setting the attached property on the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. "" 和 "" 属性值是相对大小的值，用于确定由于比例的变化而应重新生成 对象的时间。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，当 属性设置为0.5 时，只有在其大小减小到当前缓存大小的一半时，才需要重新生成 的缓存。For example, when the property is set to 0.5, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size is reduced to less than one half the size of the current cache. 若要在代码中访问此属性，请使用 和 方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对 使用缓存提示选项。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-xml[RenderOptions#CachingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml#cachingxaml)]

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示应尽可能缓存呈现内容的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates that rendered content should be cached when possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加属性受 及其派生类型的支持。This attached property is supported by and its derived types. 它旨在用于具有中间图面的画笔，如 和 。It is intended to be used with brushes that have intermediate surfaces, such as and . 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 不缓存 和 对象的呈现内容。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态方案中，无论场景中的画笔的内容和使用情况如何都没有变化，而不是缓存，因为它可节省视频内存。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当使用静态内容的画笔以非静态方式使用时，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 的默认行为是每隔一帧重新呈现画笔的所有内容，即使内容不变也是如此。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，当静态 或 映射到旋转三维对象的图面时，将发生这种情况。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现静态内容可能会对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过将画笔的 附加属性设置为 "，可以使用平铺画笔对象的缓存版本来提高性能。By setting the attached property of the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. "" 和 "" 属性值是相对大小的值，用于确定由于比例的变化而应重新生成 对象的时间。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，当 属性设置为2.0 时，只有在其大小超过当前缓存大小的两倍时，才需要重新生成 的缓存。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 若要在代码中访问此属性，请使用 和 方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对 使用缓存提示选项。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-xml[RenderOptions#CachingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml#cachingxaml)]

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值向呈现引擎指示能否用 ClearType 呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates to the rendering engine whether text can be rendered with ClearType.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 附加属性来指示可以使用 ClearType 在可视化树的特定部分呈现文本。Use the attached property to indicate that text can be rendered with ClearType in a specific part of the visual tree. ClearType 文本在不完全透明的背景上无法正确显示。ClearType text does not display correctly on a background that is not fully opaque. 中间呈现器目标（例如 、、、、和 ）可以引入不完全透明的背景。Intermediate render targets, such as , , , , , and , can introduce backgrounds that are not fully opaque. 当 WPF 检测到文本所绘制到的缓冲区可以具有透明背景时，WPF 将禁用 ClearType。WPF disables ClearType when it detects that the buffer into which text is drawn could have a transparent background. 将 属性设置为 ，以指示子树对于 ClearType 文本呈现是安全的。Set the property to to indicate that a subtree is safe for ClearType text rendering. 仅当可以确定文本呈现为完全不透明背景时才执行此操作。Do this only when you can be certain that the text is rendering to a fully opaque background. 如果子树中的某个元素引入了透明度，则可以启用 ClearType;但是，可能会出现呈现问题。When an element in the subtree introduces transparency, you can enable ClearType; however, rendering issues may occur. 如果部分子树引入了更多的中间呈现目标，则必须在该子树的子树中再次设置 。If a portion of the subtree introduces more intermediate rendering targets, you must set again on the children of that subtree. 以下列表显示了如何确保以 ClearType 显示的文本正确显示。The following list shows how to make sure that text to be rendered with ClearType appears correctly. - 请勿在 与用 ClearType 呈现的文本之间引入中间呈现目标。Do not introduce intermediate render targets between and the text to be rendered with ClearType. - 将可视化树中尽可能接近的不透明背景分配给文本。Assign an opaque background that is as close as possible in the visual tree to the text. - 请注意， 为子树重新启用 ClearType;但是，它不会强制显示 ClearType。Be aware that re-enables ClearType for a subtree; however, it does not force ClearType rendering. - 请注意， 不会覆盖你的系统设置或 设置。Be aware that does not override your system settings or settings. > [!NOTE] > 附加属性不影响 控件;不过，它确实适用于 控件。The attached property does not affect the control; however, it does work with the control. > [!NOTE] > 在许多控件上，除非在文本后设置不透明背景，否则 附加属性不起作用。On many controls, the attached property has no effect unless you set an opaque background behind the text. 若要在代码中访问此属性，请使用 和 方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 属性如何影响可视化树的不同分支。The following example shows how the property affects different branches of the visual tree. 在第一个文本块控件中，文本以 ClearType 呈现，因为文本块继承了主窗口中的设置。In the first text block control, text is rendered with ClearType because the text block inherits the setting from the main window. 在第二个文本块中，不使用 ClearType，因为已设置父元素的 属性。In the second text block, ClearType is not used because the parent element's property is set. 在第三个文本块中，使用 ，但可能会出现呈现问题。In the third text block, is used, but rendering issues may occur. ```xaml ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty ClearTypeHintProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly ClearTypeHintProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 为非文本基元获取或设置可确定其边缘呈现方式的 枚举值。

span.span: Gets or sets the enumeration value for a non-text primitive that determines how its edges are rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 附加属性可通过指定应使用有锯齿的边缘呈现的视觉对象来改善呈现性能。Use the attached property to improve rendering performance by specifying that a visual object should be rendered with aliased edges. 文本对象始终以抗锯齿显示，并通过设置边缘模式值不受影响。Text objects are always displayed with anti-aliasing, and are unaffected by setting the edge mode value. 设置视觉对象的边缘模式值时，该视觉对象的所有子代图形基元都将设置为相同的边缘模式值。When you set the edge mode value of a visual object, all the descendant drawing primitives of the visual object are set to the same edge mode value. 若要在代码中访问此属性，请使用 和 方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

Public Shared Property ProcessRenderMode As RenderMode
public: static property System::Windows::Interop::RenderMode ProcessRenderMode { System::Windows::Interop::RenderMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Interop::RenderMode value); };
member this.ProcessRenderMode : System.Windows.Interop.RenderMode with get, set

summary.span: 指定当前进程的呈现模式首选项。

span.span: Specifies the render mode preference for the current process.

value.span: 当前进程的 首选项。

span.span: The preference for the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为当前进程强制软件呈现。Use the property to force software rendering for the current process. 你可以避免在 WPF 应用程序中发生的许多呈现问题，并在将首选项更改为软件呈现时导致外部问题。You can avoid many rendering issues that occur in WPF applications and that are caused by external issues if you change your preference to software rendering. 在应用程序启动期间，如果应用程序检测到呈现问题（如慢速帧速率），则可以将呈现模式设置为 "仅软件"。During application startup, if your application detects rendering issues, such as slow frame rates, you can set the rendering mode to software only. 此外，你可能想要在应用程序运行时启用用户设置。Also, you may want to enable the user setting while the application is running. 首选项将覆盖 设置。The preference overrides the setting. 软件呈现的优先级顺序如下：The precedence order for software rendering is: 1. DisableHWAcceleration 注册表项DisableHWAcceleration registry key 2. 3. （每个目标） (per-target) **请注意** 指定一个首选项，而不一定更改实际的呈现模式。**Note** specifies a preference and does not necessarily change the actual rendering mode. 系统的其他部分可能会覆盖此首选项，并强制系统进入软件呈现。Other parts of the system may override this preference and force the system into software rendering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对 使用 方法，或对位图进行动画处理 子代。Use the method on a or descendant that is animating a bitmap. 对任何位图缩放进行动画处理时，默认高质量图像重采样算法有时可能由于消耗过多系统资源导致帧速率下降，从而导致动画明显变慢。When animating the scale of any bitmap, the default high-quality image re-sampling algorithm can sometimes consume sufficient system resources to cause frame rate degradation, effectively causing animations to stutter. 通过将 对象的 属性设置为 "，可以在缩放位图时创建更流畅的动画。By setting the property of the object to , you can create a smoother animation when scaling a bitmap. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 对象的 。The following example shows how to set the for an object. [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet2)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet2)]

summary.span: 设置指定的依赖对象上的 附加属性值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attached property on a specified dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 不缓存 和 对象的呈现内容。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态方案中，无论场景中的画笔的内容和使用情况如何都没有变化，而不是缓存，因为它可节省视频内存。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当使用静态内容的画笔以非静态方式使用时，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 的默认行为是每隔一帧重新呈现画笔的所有内容，即使内容不变也是如此。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，当静态 或 映射到旋转三维对象的图面时，将发生这种情况。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现静态内容可能会对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过将画笔的 附加属性设置为 "，可以使用平铺画笔对象的缓存版本来提高性能。By setting the attached property of the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. "" 和 "" 属性值是相对大小的值，用于确定由于比例的变化而应重新生成 对象的时间。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，当 属性设置为2.0 时，只有在其大小超过当前缓存大小的两倍时，才需要重新生成 的缓存。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 使用此方法可以在代码中设置 附加属性。Use this method to set the attached property in code. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对 使用缓存提示选项。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet3)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet3)]

span.span: The specified is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本对象始终以抗锯齿显示，并通过设置边缘模式值不受影响。Text objects are always displayed with anti-aliasing, and are unaffected by setting the edge mode value. 设置视觉对象的边缘模式值时，该视觉对象的所有子代图形基元都将设置为相同的边缘模式值。When you set the edge mode value of a visual object, all the descendant drawing primitives of the visual object are set to the same edge mode value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法将视觉对象的边缘模式设置为 。The following example shows how to use the method to set the edge mode for a visual object to . [!code-csharp[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/CSharp/Snippets.cs#setedgemode)] [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/visualbasic/snippets.vb#setedgemode)]
